problem_name: Diagnostic Assessment of Mitochondrial and Vascular Function
description: This problem involves evaluating the functionality of mitochondria and blood vessels to diagnose various health conditions. It is crucial for understanding cardiovascular health, metabolic disorders, and overall physiological performance.
you_have_this_if: You are assessing patients for cardiovascular diseases or diabetes.
You need to monitor metabolic health in athletes.
You are evaluating microcirculatory dysfunction in chronic diseases.

approaches.best_for: When assessing vascular function and mitochondrial activity in patients with specific health conditions.
approaches.key_tradeoff: While effective for specific assessments, it may not provide a comprehensive view of all vascular and mitochondrial functions.

decision_matrix.best_when: You need a reliable method to assess vascular and mitochondrial function in patients with known cardiovascular or metabolic issues.

start_here: Begin with Flow Mediated Skin Fluorescence (FMSF) as it is specifically designed for assessing vascular and mitochondrial function in relevant patient populations.
